TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileLogTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TraceListener

summary.span: 提供一个简单的侦听器，用于将日志记录输出指引至文件。

span.span: Provides a simple listener that directs logging output to file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供自动的维护功能，以根据需要根据每日或每个应用程序日志文件存档。The class provides automated maintenance capabilities to archive log files as needed, on a daily or per-application basis. 此自动存档功能有助于减少开发人员和管理员的维护职责。This automatic archival functionality helps reduce the maintenance responsibilities of developers and administrators. 实例可以添加到或集合来重定向到文本文件的日志记录输出。An instance of can be added to the or collections to redirect output from logging to a text file. 此类的实例还可以添加到`My.Application.Log`或`My.Log`（适用于 Web 应用程序） 在 Visual Basic 应用程序中。Instances of this class can also be added to `My.Application.Log` or `My.Log` (for Web applications) in Visual Basic applications. 有关详细信息，请参见[演练：更改 My.Application.Log 写入信息的位置](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)`.`For more information, see [Walkthrough: Changing Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)`.` 此类的主要功能如下：The main features of this class are: 1. *存档功能*。*Archival functionality*. 此类生成的日志文件是根据基本名称和日期，以及一个数字，以在日志的连续版本区分开来日志文件命名。The log files generated by this class are named according to the base name and the date, along with a number to distinguish the log file from successive versions of the log. 在按需创建新的日志文件。New log files are created on an as-needed basis. 文件名称的显式形式是`baseName`[-`dateStamp`] [-`version`].log，其中：The explicit form of the file name is `baseName`[-`dateStamp`][-`version`].log, where: - `baseName`部分是基本的日志名称，由指定属性。The `baseName` part is the fundamental log name, specified by the property. - `dateStamp`部件采用格式"年-月-日"，在显示时是或。The `dateStamp` part has the format "YYYY-MM-DD", and it is shown when is or . - 如果多个日志文件需要具有相同`baseName`并`dateStamp`，则`version`第一个正`Integer`，添加到的文件的名称。If more than one log file is needed with the same `baseName` and `dateStamp`, the `version` part, a positive `Integer`, is added to the file name. 2. *多个类实例*。*Multiple class instances*. 实例时，如果类写入正在使用中的文件：If an instance of the class writes to a file that is in use: - 如果正由另一个实例的类都将共享该文件在同一进程中的类。The class shares the file if it is being used by another instance of the class in the same process. - 类创建一个新的日志文件，如果该文件正由另一个进程使用下一个可用名称。The class creates a new log file using the next available name if the file is being used by another process. 3. *线程安全*。*Thread safety*. 类是线程安全。The class is thread safe. 这可以安全地将消息写入到日志从多个线程而无需使用锁。This allows you to safely write messages to the log from multiple threads without using locks. **日志文件位置****Log-File Location** - 属性采用枚举来指定要写入到日志文件的典型目录之一。The property takes a enumeration to specify one of the typical directories to write the log file to. - 若要将日志写入另一个位置，将设置到该位置的属性。To write the log to another location, set the property to that location. **日志文件的名称****Log-File Name** - 指定日志文件的基名称属性。The base name for the log file is specified by the property. - 可以从读取当前日志文件名称属性。The current log file name can be read from the property. 文件系统中，它被派生自多个其他属性和日志的当前状态。It is derived from several other properties and the current state of the logs in the file system. **日志维护****Log Maintenance** - 用于创建新的日志文件的最小频率由属性。The minimum frequency for creating new log files is determined by the property. 值是何时或、 每天或每周，新的日志文件在至少一次创建和日期戳将合并到名称。When the value is or , a new log file is created at least once every day or week, and a date stamp is incorporated into the name. - 日志文件的最大大小 （以字节为单位） 由属性。The maximum size (in bytes) of the log file is determined by the property. 如果日志文件大小超过此大小，写入到日志中的其他消息被放弃，并且，具体取决于属性，将引发异常。If the log file size exceeds this size, additional messages written to the log are discarded and, depending on the property, an exception is thrown. - 属性确定多少可用空间 （以字节为单位） 必须可用。The property determines how much free space (in bytes) must be available. 这有助于确保类不会占用所有可用磁盘空间。This helps ensure that the class will not consume all available disk space. 使用属性来指定日志的行为将写入时有小于可用字节数。Use the property to specify the behavior of log writes when there are less than bytes free. **日志文件输出设置****Log-File Output Settings** - 属性指定是否基础流应自动刷新后每次写入到日志文件。The property specifies whether the underlying stream should be flushed automatically after each write to the log file. - 属性指定是否将消息附加到当前日志文件，如果允许，或将其写入到新的日志文件。The property specifies whether to append messages to the current log file, if allowed, or write them to a new log file. - 属性指定要用于分隔在日志消息中的字段的字符串。The property specifies the string to use for delimiting the fields within a log message. - 属性指定要创建新的日志文件时使用的编码。The property specifies the encoding to use when creating a new log file. **日志文件输出****Log-File Output** - 和方法将消息写入到日志文件。The and methods write messages to the log file. 这些方法检查属性，以及任何现有的日志具有相同基名称来确定是否应创建新的日志。These methods check the property, along with any existing logs with the same base name to determine if a new log should be created. - 方法刷新到日志文件的输出缓冲区中当前的任何消息。The method flushes any messages currently in the output buffer to the log file. - 方法关闭日志文件，以便它可以由其他进程。The method closes the log file so that it can be used by other processes. **启用输出****Enabling Output** 必须启用跟踪或调试使用跟踪侦听器。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a trace listener. 下面的语法是特定的编译器。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果使用除 C# 或 Visual Basic 编译器，请参阅您的编译器的文档。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要启用调试 C# 中，添加`/d:DEBUG`到编译器命令行编译代码，也可以添加标志`#define DEBUG`到你的文件的顶部。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:DEBUG=True`到编译器命令行的标志。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要启用 C# 中的跟踪，请添加`/d:TRACE`到编译器命令行编译代码，或添加时标志`#define TRACE`到你的文件的顶部。To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:TRACE=True`到编译器命令行的标志。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. 若要设置您的侦听器级别，请编辑你的应用程序的配置文件。To set the level of your listener, edit the configuration file for your application. 在此文件中，可以添加一个侦听器，将其类型设置和其参数、 删除侦听器，或清除以前由应用程序设置的所有侦听器。Within this file, you can add a listener, set its type and set its parameters, remove a listener, or clear all the listeners previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例。The configuration file should be formatted like the following example. 若要运行此示例，必须提供完全限定的程序集名称。For this example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 有关如何获取完全限定的程序集名称的信息，请参阅[程序集名称](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法设置的实例名称类来`name`。This method sets the instance name of the class to `name`. 您可以访问实例名称认为属性。You can access the instance name thought the property.

span.span: Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Append { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Append : bool with get, set

summary.span: 确定是将输出追加到当前文件还是将输出写入新文件。

span.span: Determines whether to append the output to the current file or write it to a new file.

value.span: ， 指示将输出追加到当前文件， 指示将输出写入新文件。

span.span: , with indicating that the output is appended to the current file, and indicating that output is written to a new file.
The default setting for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`False`，则输出写入到一个新的文件。When the property is `False`, the output is written to a new file. 当该属性是`True`，将输出追加到当前文件，除非：When the property is `True`, the output is appended to the current file, unless: - 输出文件是另一个进程锁定。The output file is locked by another process. 在此情况下，将合并到一个版本号与创建新的日志文件名称。In this situation, a new log file is created with a version number that is incorporated into the name. - 当前文件大小大于什么属性允许。The current file size is greater than what the property allows. 在这种情况下，其他消息是已放弃和，具体取决于属性，将引发异常。In this situation, additional messages are discarded and, depending on the property, an exception is thrown. - 现有的文件名称是根据指定的日志创建计划过期属性。The existing file name is out of date according to the log-creation schedule specified by the property. 在此情况下，创建一个新的日志文件和日期戳将合并到名称。In this situation, a new log file is created and the date stamp is incorporated into the name.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoFlush { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoFlush : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示写入日志文件流时是否刷新缓冲区。

span.span: Indicates whether or not the writing to the log file stream flushes the buffer.

value.span: ， 指示每次写入之后都刷新日志文件流；否则将缓存日志条目，这样写入会更有效率。

span.span: , with indicating that the stream is flushed after every write; otherwise the log entries are buffered and written more efficiently.
The default setting for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `False`设置为属性提供大多数应用程序的最佳性能，因为它是更高效，若要一次将多条消息写入日志文件。The `False` setting for the property provides the best performance for most applications, because it is more efficient to write multiple messages to the log file at one time. 可以使用方法来刷新当前在日志文件中的任何消息的输出缓冲区。You can use the method to flush any messages currently in the log file's output buffer. 此外可以使用方法，它隐式关闭日志文件之前刷新流。You can also use the method, which implicitly flushes the stream before closing the log file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BaseFileName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BaseFileName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置日志文件的基名称，该名称用于创建日志文件的完整名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the base name for the log files, which is used to create the full log-file name.
The base name for the log files.

value.span: 默认为应用程序的产品名称。

span.span: The default is the application's product name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定的基名称的日志文件类写入。The property determines the base name for the log files that the class writes to. 属性提供当前的日志文件的完整名称。The property gives the current full log-file name. 它由系统根据日志路径、 基名称、 日期和数字来区分来自不同版本的日志生成。It is generated according to the log path, the base name, the date, and a number to distinguish it from different versions of the log. 在按需创建新的日志文件。New log files are created on an as-needed basis. 完整日志文件名称的显式形式是`path` \\ `baseName`[-`dateStamp`] [-`iteration`].log，其中The explicit form of the full log file name is `path`\\`baseName`[-`dateStamp`][-`iteration`].log, where - `path`由一部分属性，如果该属性值设置为，则属性。The `path` part is determined by the property and, if that property value is set to , the property. - `baseName`部分是基本的日志名称，由指定属性。The `baseName` part is the fundamental log name, specified by the property. - `dateStamp`部件采用格式"年-月-日"，在显示时设置为或。The `dateStamp` part has the format "YYYY-MM-DD", and it is shown when is set to or . - 如果多个日志文件需要具有相同`baseName`并`dateStamp`，则`iteration`第一个正`Integer`，添加到的文件的名称。If more than one log file is needed with the same `baseName` and `dateStamp`, the `iteration` part, a positive `Integer`, is added to the file name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 关闭当前日志文件的基础流，并释放与当前流关联的所有资源。

span.span: Closes the underlying stream for the current log file and releases any resources associated with the current stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要调用方法显式，因为类管理的基础流。You do not need to call the method explicitly, because the class manages the underlying steam.

summary.span: 当 属性设置为 时获取或设置日志文件目录。

span.span: Gets or sets the log file directory when the property is set to .
, which is the name of the log-file directory.

value.span: 此属性的默认设置是用户的应用程序数据目录。

span.span: The default setting for this property is the user's directory for application data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置，它还会设置属性设置为。When the property is set, it also sets the property to . 属性将引发异常，如果该目录不能被解析。The property will throw an exception if the directory cannot be resolved.

member this.Delimiter : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于在日志消息中分隔字段的分隔符。

span.span: Gets or sets the delimiter used to delimit fields within a log message.

value.span: ，用作日志消息中字段的分隔符。

span.span: , which is the delimiter used for fields within a log message.

value.span: 此属性的默认设置为制表符字符。

span.span: The default setting for this property is the TAB character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以更改默认分隔符。The property allows you to change the default delimiter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::DiskSpaceExhaustedOption DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior { Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::DiskSpaceExhaustedOption get(); void set(Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::DiskSpaceExhaustedOption value); };

summary.span: 确定在写入日志文件时，如果可用磁盘空间小于 属性所指定的磁盘空间时应采取的操作。

span.span: Determines what to do when writing to the log file and there is less free disk space available than specified by the property.

value.span: 确定在尝试写入日志文件时，如果可用磁盘空间小于 属性所指定的磁盘空间，或日志文件大小大于 属性所允许的大小，应采取的操作。

span.span: Determines what to do when attempting to write to the log file and there is less free disk space available than specified by the property, or if the log file size is greater than what the property allows.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为，如果保留的磁盘空间不足，日志消息将以无提示方式会被丢弃。When the property is set to , the log messages are silently discarded if there is not enough reserved disk space. 这是默认行为，并且它会阻止从失败的磁盘空间不足时的简单应用程序。This is the default behavior, and it prevents simple applications from failing if the disk gets too full. 更可靠的应用程序可以设置属性设置为，并添加`Try...Catch`块周围的所有代码都将写入日志。More robust applications can set the property to , and add `Try...Catch` blocks around all code that writes to the log.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若为 ，释放托管资源和非托管资源；若为 ，则只释放非托管资源。

span.span: releases both managed and unmanaged resources; releases only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 关闭基础流，并可以选择释放托管资源。

span.span: Closes the underlying stream and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `disposing` 参数为 `True` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `True`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 此方法调用方法的基类， 。

span.span: This method calls the method of the base class, .

, which is the current full log-file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供当前的日志文件的完整名称。The property gives the current full log-file name. 它由系统根据日志路径、 基名称、 日期和数字来区分来自不同版本的日志生成。It is generated according to the log path, the base name, the date, and a number to distinguish it from different versions of the log. 在按需创建新的日志文件。New log files are created on an as-needed basis. 日志文件的完整名称的显式形式是`path` \\ `baseName`[-`dateStamp`] [-`iteration`].log，其中：The explicit form of the full log-file name is `path`\\`baseName`[-`dateStamp`][-`iteration`].log, where: - `path`由一部分属性，如果该属性值设置为，则属性。The `path` part is determined by the property and, if that property value is set to , the property. - `baseName`部分是基本的日志名称，由指定属性。The `baseName` part is the fundamental log name, specified by the property. - `dateStamp`一部分采用格式年-月-日，它显示何时是或。The `dateStamp` part has the format YYYY-MM-DD, and it is shown when is or . - 如果多个日志文件需要具有相同`baseName`并`dateStamp`，则`iteration`第一个正`Integer`，添加到的文件的名称。If more than one log file is needed with the same `baseName` and `dateStamp`, the `iteration` part, a positive `Integer`, is added to the file name.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileLocation Location { Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileLocation get(); void set(Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileLocation value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置日志文件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets location for the log files.
, which is the location for the log file.
The default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用属性设置为其中一个预定义的路径，由日志路径枚举值。Use the property to set the log path to one of the predefined paths, determined by the enumeration values. |**位置值****Location value**|**路径****Path**| |------------------------|--------------| ||在具有格式的所有用户之间共享的应用程序数据路径：The path for the application data that is shared among all users, with the format:

`BasePath`\\`CompanyName`\\`ProductName`\\`ProductVersion`

典型值为`BasePath`是：A typical value for `BasePath` is:

C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application DataC:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data

值`CompanyName`， `ProductName`，和`ProductVersion`来自程序集。The values of `CompanyName`, `ProductName`, and `ProductVersion` come from the assembly.| ||启动了应用程序的可执行文件的路径。The path for the executable file that started the application.| ||具有格式的用户的应用程序数据路径：The path for the application data of a user, with the format:

`BasePath`\\`CompanyName`\\`ProductName`\\`ProductVersion`

典型值为`BasePath`是：A typical value for `BasePath` is:

C:\Documents and Settings\\`username`\Application DataC:\Documents and Settings\\`username`\Application Data

值`CompanyName`， `ProductName`，和`ProductVersion`来自程序集。The values of `CompanyName`, `ProductName`, and `ProductVersion` come form the assembly.| ||当前系统的临时文件夹的路径。The path of the current system's temporary folder.| ||如果指定的字符串不为空，然后将其用作路径; 否则使用用户的应用程序数据的路径。If the string specified by is not empty, then use it as the path; otherwise use the path for the application data of a user.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileCreationScheduleOption LogFileCreationSchedule { Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileCreationScheduleOption get(); void set(Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileCreationScheduleOption value); };

summary.span: 确定要包括在日志文件名称中的日期。

span.span: Determines which date to include in the names of the log files.

value.span: 此项指示要包括在日志文件名称中的日期。

span.span: This indicates which date to include in the log-file names.
The default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 将一个分配枚举值来属性来指定要在日志文件的名称中包含的日期。Assign one of the enumeration values to the property to specify which date to include in the names of the log files. 日期的格式是 YYYY。The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD. 有关格式的日志文件名称的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on the format of the log file name, see . |**LogFileCreationSchedule 值****LogFileCreationSchedule value**|**在日志文件名称中的日期****Date in the log file name**| |---------------------------------------|-----------------------------------| ||将当前日期包括在日志文件名称中。Include the current date in the log file name.| ||不要将日期包括在日志文件名称中。Do not include the date in the log file name.| ||将当前周的第一天包括在日志文件名称中。Include the first day of the current week in the log file name.

在星期六开始执行一周。The week starts on Saturday.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxFileSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxFileSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置所允许的日志文件的最大大小，以字节为单位。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum allowed size of the log file, in bytes.

value.span: 这是允许的日志文件的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: This is the maximum allowed log-file size, in bytes.
The default value is 5000000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性以确保，日志文件不会变得太大。Use this property to make sure that the log files do not grow too large. 如果在日志文件大小 （以字节为单位） 大于此属性的值然后当类尝试将消息写入到日志中，消息被丢弃，故障是无提示或异常引发具体取决于值属性。If the log file size (in bytes) is greater than the value of this property, then when the class attempts to write a message to the log, the message is discarded and the failure is either silent or an exception is thrown depending on the value of the property. 否则，消息写入到日志中，如果数量的可用磁盘空间 （以字节为单位） 小于。Otherwise, the message is written to the log, if the amount of free disk space (in bytes) is less than .

exception.span: 当此属性被设置为一个小于 1000 的值时。

span.span: When this property is set to a value less than 1000.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long ReserveDiskSpace { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.ReserveDiskSpace : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在将消息写入日志文件之前需要满足的可用磁盘空间量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of free disk space, in bytes, necessary before messages can be written to the log file.

value.span: 这是所需的可用磁盘空间量。

span.span: This is the amount of free disk space necessary.
The default value is 10000000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性以确保日志文件不要完全填充该磁盘。Use this property to make sure that the log files do not completely fill the disk. 如果的可用磁盘空间 （以字节为单位） 小于此属性的值然后当类尝试将消息写入到日志中，消息被丢弃，故障是无提示或异常引发具体取决于值 属性。If the amount of free disk space (in bytes) is less than the value of this property, then when the class attempts to write a message to the log, the message is discarded and the failure is either silent or an exception is thrown depending on the value of the property. 否则，消息写入到日志中，如果日志文件大小 （以字节为单位） 大于。Otherwise, the message is written to the log, if the log file size (in bytes) is greater than .

exception.span: 当此属性被设置为小于 0 的值时。

span.span: When this property is set to a value less than 0.

summary.span: 向输出文件写入跟踪数据。

span.span: Writes trace data to the output file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不应由应用程序代码调用。 methods are not intended to be called by application code. 这些方法调用的成员， ，和类编写要输出的跟踪数据。These methods are called by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output.

override this.TraceData : System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache * string * System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType * int * obj -> unit

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.

param.name: source
param.span: 调用此方法的跟踪源的名称。

span.span: A name of the trace source that invoked this method.
One of the enumeration values.
A numeric identifier for the event.
The trace data to emit.

summary.span: 向输出文件或流中写入跟踪信息、数据对象和事件信息。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法：This method: 1. 设置输出的数据和上下文信息的格式。Formats the data and context information for output. 2. 如有必要，请创建新的日志文件。Creates a new log file, if necessary. 3. 将信息写入日志文件。Writes the information to the log file. 创建新的日志文件的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on creating new log files, see . 下表列出了它们的显示的顺序中的输出字段。The following table lists the output fields in the order they appear. 字段分隔字符串的属性指定，且后跟行结束符。The fields are delimited by the string that the property specifies, and are followed by a line terminator. |**字段****Field**|**输出条件****Output condition**|**说明****Description**| |---------------|--------------------------|---------------------| |`source`|AlwaysAlways|`name` 的值。The value of `name`.| |`severity`|AlwaysAlways|枚举值名称`eventType`。The enumeration-value name of `eventType`.| |`id`|AlwaysAlways|`id` 的字符串表示形式。The string representation of `id`.| |`message`|AlwaysAlways|`data` 的字符串表示形式。The string representation of `data`.| |`callStack`|当中设置了标志属性。When the flag is set in the property.|属性的`eventCache`。The property of `eventCache`.| |`CorrelationID`|当中设置了标志属性。When the flag is set in the property.|属性的`eventCache`。The property of `eventCache`.| |`DateTime`|当中设置了标志属性。When the flag is set in the property.|字符串表示形式属性的`eventCache`。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 字符串转换为使用固定区域性。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`ProcessID`|当中设置了标志属性。When the flag is set in the property.|字符串表示形式属性的`eventCache`。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 字符串转换为使用固定区域性。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`ThreadID`|当中设置了标志属性。When the flag is set in the property.|属性的`eventCache`。The property of `eventCache`.| |`Timestamp`|当中设置了标志属性。When the flag is set in the property.|字符串表示形式属性的`eventCache`。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 字符串转换为使用固定区域性。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`HostName`|当属性是`True`。When the property is `True`.|计算机的名称。The name of the computer.|

span.span: The custom message to write.

summary.span: 将消息逐字写入磁盘，不带任何附加上下文信息。

span.span: Writes a verbatim message to disk, without any additional context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将特定的消息写入到日志文件，而无需任何附加上下文信息。The method writes a specific message to the log file, without any additional context information. 使用的一个方法以包含上下文信息的日志输出。Use the one of the methods to include the context information in the log output.

span.span: Writes a verbatim message to disk, followed by the current line terminator, without any additional context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将特定的消息写入到日志文件，而无需任何附加上下文信息。The method writes a specific message to the log file, without any additional context information. 使用的一个方法以包含上下文信息的日志输出。Use the one of the methods to include the context information in the log output.
